entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
